website_summaries.verdict: Basic sushi-rolling kit for someone on a budget who doesn't want to sacrifice quality.
pros: Three times cheaper than most other kits
Comes with rice spreader, rice spoon, and two bamboo rice mats
cons: Cannot be put into the dishwasher for cleaning

customer_reviews.title: My food came out great!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE AS PROMISED: So I tried it and it was fantastic! I think I did pretty good. I have not used it but it came on time. It looks great. And when i make the food I'll post the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: My2Prettyeyes4u

customer_reviews.title: Am now a sushi-making fool...
customer_reviews.text: I tried making sushi on a whim the other day and it was a hot mess. Now that I know how to make rice properly, I decided I should get a suitable mat to work with. Oh my - what a difference that makes!! I am now a sushi-making fool, and want to ROLL ALL THE THINGS!
customer_reviews.author: ThePeachMartini

customer_reviews.title: Mold after first use, no response from seller
customer_reviews.text: This roller is easy to use but it molded up after first use. Barely bought a month ago and the price dropped $2. I contacted the seller and still no response.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: BambooWorx works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend . At first I wanted to check the reviews on the “new devices” for making sushi rolls. The other tools looked cool but, I decided to go the traditional route due to the great reviews posted for BambooWorx. It worked perfectly! This was our first, yes FIRST time making sushi and it was so easy. Thanks BambooWorx!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great, actually came out rather professional looking and not ...
customer_reviews.text: First attempt at making anything sushi related. Watched a video on making a California roll (since you don't need sushi grade fish) and purchased this kit for the trial. Worked out great, actually came out rather professional looking and not only pleased myself, but everyone else who tried it. Nice quality bamboo with choice of 2 style mats, and the bamboo utensils were perfect for the application, Should get many satisfying uses out of this kit. Super fast shipping too. A+
customer_reviews.author: Mikea

customer_reviews.title: Okay product, bad service
customer_reviews.text: I like the kit just fine - the spreader is handy, and the mats are sturdy, easy to clean, and roll good sushi - but mine came without a bamboo paddle. I have reached out to the seller 3x now to ask them for the missing part but I've heard zero response. The product is fine. However, if I had known that the customer service would be so useless and irritating and that 1/4 of my kit would never come, I'd have bought a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: I love California rolls but can't afford to go to my favorite place to buy them all the time. I decided to buy this to make some at home. It arrived quickly and neatly packaged. They do have a bit of a strong odor, but not awful. My first time using this, my rolls turned out great. I do need to practice a little more, but it was fun to use and worked as intended. Everything is very sturdy and I know it will last a long time. Excellent value since you get so many things.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: The best sushi kit!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted to make sushi at home, but kept thinking it would never be possible. I took a chance on this sushi kit and I’m so happy I did! The box is lovely and wonderfully designed. It comes with two mats, 5 pairs of chopsticks, and 2 rice paddles. I was feeling like a true sushi chef in no time! I definitely recommend wrapping your mats with Saran Wrap so that it protects the quality of the mat over time. I wanted to avoid having the difficulty in removing stubborn rice off the mat. It was so easy to use and really reassuring that I had all the right tools. Highly recommend getting this for home sushi enthusiasts!
customer_reviews.author: Christine N

customer_reviews.title: Fun, cute kit! Not the highest quality, but great price.
customer_reviews.text: For such a cheap lot, this is great. The tools all match and look nice, especially for inviting friends over to use - definitely has a fun vibe. The quality is OK, though. The chopsticks will last a while, love them, but the tools are pretty flimsy. I expect they'll last long enough since this isn't something I'll use too frequently but still. The mats are fine - you'll want to cover them in plastic wrap or something otherwise they'll be tough to clean. You can look up videos online to help! Overall a really fun kit but not something meant to last forever for those that expect to use regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Rolls Up Beautiful Sushi
customer_reviews.text: I received this a couple of days ago and I've only used it once, but so far it seems very simple to use. I have never made sushi before, but as far as I can tell this rolling mat works well. I laid some saranwrap on top, layered the rice, seaweed, shrimp, etc on top and it rolled together really nice. I would recommend this rolling kit!
customer_reviews.author: JJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived super quickly! Next morning! I was so impressed with the speed of my order! Even more impressive than that is the quality of the set. Each piece is well made and beautiful! The rice paddle and spreader were both incredibly light and had a great feel, the mats worked fantastically and are great quality! I will definitely recommend these mats to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Audry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Decent set for sushi making but only one KIND of the rolling mat (not the green one)☝️
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice set of sushi making supplies, made if good wood. Last time we wanted to make sushi at home but didn't have any rolling mat. So my husband used cardboard from a box wrapped in plastic and it turned out great but I didn't want him to suffer like that again haha. I think this set will help better, but I wish there were two DIFFERENT rolling mats. That way we can both make rolls at the same time to speed up the process (I prefer the green kind of the bamboo mat for sushi making and can't do it with this one).🤷🏻‍♀️ Didn't use it yet but I hope it's as good as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff (Edited to Add..)
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 8 year old son who showed interest in making sushi. It's definitely a nice kit that has everything you need to make sushi. Easy to use and clean. My son is very happy to make his own sushi. Edited: After reading the reviews I want to add that we received a complete set in a perfect shape. I bought 2 months ago and used it several times with no molds problem. The kit is easy to use and store. For this price you get many useful pieces to serve the purpose of the kit. Happy customer here. I hope this can help undecided buyers after reading the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Neno

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit because I wanted to try making sushi, but I want sure how it would go, so I didn't want to spend a ton. It was really fun to make our own rolls at home! Kikoman has a great how-to video on YouTube that we followed. This set was affordable and was exactly what we needed. Great set & great value.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: We had a sushi making party at my house and EVERYONE enjoyed using the items from the kit! Very well put together at a VERY nice price! Thank you BambooWorx for making our celebration extra special.
customer_reviews.author: LPallatin

customer_reviews.title: One of the mats started splintering after first use/wash
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price, comes with 2 mats, a spoon and a spreader and 4 sets of cute chopsticks. Everything was great except after washing (by hand with a sponge) the mats one of them started splintering off in places which isn't good. So far the 2nd hasn't done that which is good but i'm wondering how many washes and uses these will stand. Beware, don't get rice in the mat it is SUPER hard to clean out. Spreader dipped in water spread rice like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: First time sushi rollers
customer_reviews.text: I tried making sushi for the first time with my boyfriend this weekend and we did it! Watch a youtube video and you'll be set. It has 2 mats so we were able to roll ours at the same time. Fun date night idea. We put seal wrap on it so it was an easy clean up. Cute set for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Broken package, missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic zipper package this came in was broken/unzippable. It said it came with 2 rolling mats, a rice spreader and a rice paddle... the rice paddle was no where to be found in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: pro: gets the job done cons: the rice sticks on this stuff if you dont clean it right away. the mats are really hard to clean if anything gets in between the little sticks. also it did not come as pictured. it came in a plastic bag
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: All items not delivered.
customer_reviews.text: We only received the two rollers, not the other products. The bag with the rollers was partially opened.
customer_reviews.author: Karl B. Beutel

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought a mat with the two utensils
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've used a sushi making kit, and I was surprised. I'm glad I bought a mat with the two utensils. The paddle and spreading knife were very useful for transfering the rice to the mat. I was expecting the rice to stick when I was rolling my first sushi rolls, but they came right off fairly easily. Clean up wasn't that much of a hassle, either. I just used a brush to get in the grooves.
customer_reviews.author: Averey

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty nice. I got it because I’m a beginner at making sushi. I thought it looked super nice ad good quality online and thought it was going to be packaged nicely. It came in a paper box that was falling apart. I would have preferred to have a packaging that it could be stored in. It did feel a little cheap. Maybe because it’s bamboo but I felt like I would be getting splinters. I’ll still use it though and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Jens

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! It came with 2 mats and a bunch of chopsticks. The rice paddle was pretty good as well. The mats are a little hard to clean and I do not want to scrub with a heavy hand and break it. A kit with only one mat and a rice paddle was double the price at an Asian vendor and it appeared to be the same quality. I’ve made a ton of sushi since buying and they look pretty good for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Mamushka

customer_reviews.title: Great mats!
customer_reviews.text: The mats are exactly what I wanted - easy to use and clean. The Paddle and Spreader had a horrid smell to them, and no matter how much we washed them I couldn't get the smell off them. We tossed them as I tried using it with the rice, but it made the rice taste weird! So, mats are great, utensils... not so much.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reiter

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need to get started!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit having never made sushi before. It arrived in pristine condition. I have used the kit twice now. Just finished making some sushi, in fact. I find that it is more than sufficient to do the job. I put one of the rolling mats into a gallon sized zip lock bag to keep it clean while rolling the sushi. It rolls just fine and cleans up easily. If you are looking for a kit to make sushi, this one will definitely do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tal R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sushi kit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use and sushi turns out great! Happy I bought this. Has everything you need. The mat is a little hard to clean if you don’t use plastic. But that’s easily not a problem with plastic. Recommend to buy!
customer_reviews.author: er9838

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Super great value for the product. It doesn't look cheao at all and I would even suggest it as a gift. I bought this to make gimbap and ot was easy to use and the kit came with the essentials. My only concern would be the smell, I don't know if it's the box or the bamboo set itself. Nothing major, the smell goes away after a quick wash with some dish soap. Also, thank you to the seller for doing a follow up! Great customer care.
customer_reviews.author: agnes

customer_reviews.title: Very chic
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with everything you need to make sushi. Plus it’s very chic. The chopsticks are sturdy and smooth. The bamboo mat is great for multiple use and the rice spoon is great for spreading the rice on the seaweed. You’ll look very professional when hosting a sushi making class or dinner party.
customer_reviews.author: Shavon Battle

customer_reviews.title: Great sushi mat and extras at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was just shopping for a bamboo sushi rolling mat, but when I saw this product with the chopsticks, rice paddle, rice spreader and bamboo mats for a low price, I decided on this. It's excellent! I'm new at making sushi, and the bamboo mat really made it easy. It wiped clean easily once I was done. The chopsticks are really pretty and are great quality. They make grabbing food easier than my metal chopsticks. All in all, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Coon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly how it was described!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting TWO mats! I'm really digging that! You can't beat this price for two sushi mats with utensils. Arrived on time and in good packaging that can be used for storage. I might get my goddaughter one for Christmas because we both Love California rolls and have always wanted to make our own.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, everything as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Everything arrived as expected, all of the tools were well crafted and beautiful. The mats themselves do what they're supposed to, and after making our first roll, we only got better at it! The bamboo mats are pretty difficult to clean thoroughly after sticky rice has touched it, so my advice would be to use saran wrap in between the mat and the sushi you are trying to roll. Just make sure there is enough excess saran wrap that it doesn't get tucked into your roll! The best part is that the seller is a small business and they reached out a couple times to make sure everything was correct and in good condition with our order!
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Make Sushi At Home!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great! My girlfriend and I love making sushi at home with these utensils. It really is easy now to make one of our favorite dishes we used to eat when going out more often.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Leva

customer_reviews.title: Great Date Night
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift/date night activity with my fiancee. It was so wonderful to make one of our favorite meals that we normally go out to eat. Would suggest covering with plastic wrap. It takes about a scoop and a half of sticky rice per nori but its deffinity something to work with your personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: nicole poole

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time, there were no issues with the seller. All components are well made and durable. I've used it once thus far (just got it a few days ago) and it made sushi rolling pretty easy. I love the bamboo utensils- it made the spreading of the rice so easy and mess free. I'd purchase this product again! Just be sure to take care of bamboo cookware properly if you want it to last.
customer_reviews.author: B. Graham

customer_reviews.title: which I really like. Side note
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit about a month ago, and finally had a chance to use it last weekend. It came in handy packaging that is also used for storage, which I really like. Side note: the package contains a set of ribbons for gifting-super cool touch. I used this with my son to make a variety of Gimbap, and they worked perfectly. The included rice paddle and spreader are compact and of good quality. Cleanup was a snap, and once the components were dry they went right back in the sealable bag they came in.
customer_reviews.author: thelomen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to get you going
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Don't forget to wet the paddle and spreader before and during use to keep the rice from sticking (also your fingers). Hand wash after use and the paddles stay super clean. Wrap the mat in plastic wrap for easy cleaning :)
customer_reviews.author: some guy on the internet

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a low price!
customer_reviews.text: I've never made my own sushi before, however I have watched a friend make sushi w/similar sushi making utensils. I enjoy eating sushi, and knowing how easy it is to prepare I wanted my own utensils so accomplish this, so I purchased this starter making kit. It's all made from bamboo, and easy to use....Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Scotti

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love my new sushi making kit, so simply my 12 year old made her very first sushi perfect. Cleaning was easy the bamboo is of good quality and very sturdy, no imperfections like ridges of any kind, very smooth. Simply Amazing Product. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Bluster

customer_reviews.title: Easy sushi at home
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Friday, seller shipped so quickly I received it on Sunday. It comes with the tools you need to make sushi at home. Everything arrived in a flat cardboard box that was sealed with plastic. There were no missing items inside. Each item feels like they are of good quality and they are simple to clean. This is well worth the $8 I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: ANONYMOUS

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Pretty straight forward stuff. Used it to make my first sushi rolls ever. I wrapped the bamboo in plastic wrap to stop rice from sticking. Dipping tools in water helps also.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: STEAL!
customer_reviews.text: YALL! For the price, you can't beat this. Used the kit to make sushi as a first timer and had no issues at all. The wrap made it super easy and the chopsticks are great quality. The wooden spoon was a lifesaver with spreading the sticky rice. Only issue was cleaning rice out of the crevices of the wrap but hard to avoid that with any similar product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Van Houten

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, like the extras.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is great. Also, I didn’t want the “easy to use” molds with slots to cut since I think I can handle it and prefer the more authentic technique. The spoon, spreader and chopsticks weren’t necessary but a nice bonus. FYI The box looks big in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: The rice spreader and scoop are beautifully made and also worked very well
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple sushi map since I just started making sushi rolls at home. The mat is high quality and worked very well. The rice spreader and scoop are beautifully made and also worked very well. On a side note: The seller contacted me when my order was shipped and then again after I received it to make sure I was happy with my order. I think that is incredible and made me feel I was important to them as a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Angie M.

customer_reviews.title: Product came as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is our first sushi kit and products. All parts are as described, and easy to use. I do not have experience with these types of products, so I do not know how long they will last. But our family enjoyed. Follow some simple guidance found on Youtube for making sushi, like wrapping the bamboo rollers in plastic wrap, and water on the paddles, will allow these products to last longer and easy to clean. Hand clean and let dry completely before putting away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's really well made!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for the first time today making onigirazu, and it was great! I can't give a durability rating on it as I JUST got it, nor can I vouch for its ease of cleaning over time as I was pretty protective of it in my meal prep. I'll wager that it's easy to clean if it's not been stained (unvarnished bamboo absorbs stains).
customer_reviews.author: A. Cato

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I used this to make sushi together for the very first time. Following some internet advice, we placed ours in plastic ziploc bags before using, and so clean-up was a breeze! The spreaders were great and just the right size. We had no problems rolling our sushi (except our nori sheets were cut a little off for our fillings, but that had nothing to do with the kit. This was a great investment for a great price. The bamboo is a little thin, so just be careful how you store it to prevent it breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great value
customer_reviews.text: We are new to DIY sushi, but are very happy with how this works. The mat makes it very easy to roll rice/nori, and the rice spreader makes it so much easier to keep the rice on the nori instead of my fingers. The mat is a little tricky to clean, but I've been covering it with cling wrap (especially if rolling with rice on the outside), which helps. The items appear to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Julkamb

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel
customer_reviews.text: I grew up using bamboo chopsticks, so after finding this I had to get it. Everything seems made with good quality, I like the little spiral in the chopsticks so it fits nicely in my hand. I have not gotten a chance to use them as I did not get wood oil to coat these per the instructions. Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: tough call
customer_reviews.text: honestly i bought this while trying my very 1st attempt at making sushi however, i found i rolled the sushi without even using this. on my 2nd attempt i actually used it and didn't really notice it helped much. was really tough to rate because i didnt need it but all sushi video's i watch the person uses it. i just found it extremely easy to roll without it.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva Moon

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift for anytime
customer_reviews.text: My daughters xmas present she is gonna faint and now my adult daughter wants one....I feel this is such a perfect gift for anytime ESPECIALLY if they love different cultures of food and cooking them absolutely what I expect and I'm so happy well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter kit for everyone
customer_reviews.text: My family and I loved it, had a make your own sushi day and it was great and fun. I bought 2 sets made 4 stations and very helpful tools. I would definitely purchase another if I need more stations or a gift...
customer_reviews.author: elvis chavez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Impossibly hard to clean rolling mats when the rice kernels are in between. I put the rolling mats in a gallon ziploc after watching a beginner video and it is perfect for cleaning and rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Alisabella

customer_reviews.title: Wrap the mat in plastic wrap.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time making sushi and it came out GREAT. As long as you cover the sushi mat with plastic wrap it's very easy to clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad that I bought this product. There are so many different sushi kits on the market that it can be a little overwhelming. This product was easy to use and for my first time I did a pretty good job. I dislike saran wrap and used the trick of putting my mat in a ziplock bag instead and it worked great. It makes for easy clean up as well!
customer_reviews.author: Danmarie

customer_reviews.title: Got your product a couple of days ago and received it in good shape and in a timely matter using USPS
customer_reviews.text: Hi Nancy. Got your product a couple of days ago and received it in good shape and in a timely matter using USPS. The Sushi making kit was great and made the job easy. My mother in-law use to make it and loved it. So now she has past on I wanted to start making it myself. So long story short, I will be ordering more product from you guys in the future. Great job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, A Great Tool to Have in Your Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The seller is so sweet who kept me updated on shipment and delivery. The product came in a neat box not just a plastic bag. The tool is very easy to use. I love using it to make small rice rolls with different proteins or veggies for my toddlers to hold and eat as rice can be very messy with kids. The chopsticks and rice scoops came in with the mats are sturdy and well made. Such a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shimin Bao

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a sushi roll maker
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to make cauli rice kimbap love this sushi roll maker. Pros great price Easy to use Cons Not always easy to clean, but keep in mind I use sticky made cauli rice instead of actual rice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I can use it, anyone can...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice beginners sushi making kit. It comes with two mats and two utensils in a nice storage bag. We were able to master our sushi rolls with it on the first try. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants to prepare their own sushi at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL Packaging and Product - Thank YOU!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two [2] of these...one for myself, and another for a gift. The kits arrived on time, and beautifully packaged / presented - in a decorative box with plastic sealant. When I opened my box, everything was intact and visually displayed just like the product photo, with an appealing woody smell filling the air. Thank YOU!
customer_reviews.author: vykhab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to write reviews BUT the quality of this kit really blew me away!! I didn’t have high expectations when I bought this kit for 7 bucks. This should be at least double what it costs... you’re definitely getting way more than what you paid for. Did I mention you’re getting TWO rolling mats?!
customer_reviews.author: Lee-Sam

customer_reviews.title: Bought it to make buckwheat Sushi.
customer_reviews.text: My last kit lasted 12 years and I bought this one to replace it. I have discovered that even diabetics can enjoy sushi if they use buckwheat instead of rice. I can't find any local sushi places who make sushi with buckwheat, so I make my own. There are Youtube video's that show how to use buckwheat instead of rice. You can use both the buckwheat soba noodles and the groats. Anyway, this kit works perfectly for making tight rolls.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money. Holding well after months of use
customer_reviews.author: Fos

customer_reviews.title: Cool kit
customer_reviews.text: After getting this kit and using it, I probably only needed the mat. But this kit gives you multiple pieces, so hey. For the price, its a cool little kit....good price and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Prettygirl901

customer_reviews.title: I messed it up :(
customer_reviews.text: While sushi turns out to be something that’s incredibly hard to make and master, this kit does the job it’s made for. So if you’re going to master the art of sushi making or you already perfected it this product will do the job it says it will. Me on the other hand... no bueno
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: ... one of these before and I found it very easy to use and make perfect Sushi rolls
customer_reviews.text: I have never used one of these before and I found it very easy to use and make perfect Sushi rolls. The wooden spoons are very nice too. Now that we have made some sushi we are going to keep making it. It's delicious and good for you. Thank you for selling these mats. We love them! Mike from Tonasket, Wash.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Beginner maker sushi loving and like manu others i cannot afford to buy sushi at every craving. After reading the revies i bought tgis AMAZING KIT. Easy to use, great quality i even watched you tube to learn how to use the chopsticks....Nothing in this kit goes unused. My kids and I LOVED IT. Amazing quality at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mmiajg

customer_reviews.title: Nice sushi kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice sushi kit. We made our own rolls for the first time using this kit. It was very easy and it had everything we needed.
customer_reviews.author: michelle chase

customer_reviews.title: You don’t get chopsticks
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive chop sticks with my kit. The kit is easy to use but nothing great.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Khaldi

customer_reviews.title: CutSet with little splinters 🙁
customer_reviews.text: Overall opinion of unboxing the set: Cute, clean, neat, but unfortunately it has so many tiny little splinters on the rice spreaders. I will have to wrap them with plastic wrap before my initial use.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to roll
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making Sushi at home. Didn't realize how much I needed this. Make life so much easier. Highly recommended..
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Dibla

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done; the knife is really good at spreading rice
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. I usually end up ignoring the rice paddle and just using the knife, which is great for spreading rice. I only ever use one of the mats, but it's nice to have an extra in case someone wants to come over and make sushi together. Don't forget to wrap them in saran wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Anon Ymous

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I made my first vegan sushi at home recently and it was fantastic. This set is easy to use and clean. It’s going to be getting a lot of work! Follow me on Instagram @blkgirlwellness for pics of my first roll and holistic wellness tips.
customer_reviews.author: Pavielle Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Never used it
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars. I don’t want to give a bad review to something I never used. I bought it with aspirations of making vegan sushi, took one look at the directions online, and decided to order sushi from Postmates instead. It’s cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley JJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun Family Time
customer_reviews.text: I chopped a bunch of veggies up and we rolled sushi together, even my little ones (ages 6&8) had fun rolling their own dinner. We probably could have had tighter rolls, but they were delicious and beautiful and we had a great time.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but mine is not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, but one of the mats I received had a ragged/splintered piece in the weave. Still works when wrapped in plastic wrap, but feel like for the price I should have gotten one that was in good condition. Couldn’t be bothered to go through return hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and elegant. great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A really good bamboo sushi set. I really like the chopsticks. The size and twist feels really comfortable in my big hands
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Ethridge

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to learn with
customer_reviews.text: Got the entire set for a sushi learning night at the house. Needless to say, I was very happy with our results! Granted I have many friends that work as chefs in sushi restaurants, so I have the upper hand you could say. Shipping was fast and easy. Product was very easy to use for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Buy

customer_reviews.title: Beginners Sushi Set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is good for beginners not looking to spend a lot of money learning. We will be upgrading to a better set in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ian & Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: 1st time making sushi
customer_reviews.text: Used this kit for my 1st time making sushi and after watching a couple videos it wasn’t as hard as they make it out to be just buy yourself a good rice cooker because that’s the hardest thing to get right the rest is common sense
customer_reviews.author: George Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Good buy/does what I should
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to making sushi, but I’m a pastry chef and have been cooking for decades, so.... while my sushi isn’t perfect, I think I might have had better results than others. Honestly, I really love the set and recommend it to anyone trying to make sushi. It’s inexpensive and does the job (paddles and mats). The chopsticks are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Flavian

customer_reviews.title: Kit looks great
customer_reviews.text: Kit is as described, haven’t gotten around to making sushi yet but will update once I get the opportunity to use for that, have used the chopsticks once for ramen, probably not the best idea as the wood just absorbed most of the broth and I don’t really think you can clean that.
customer_reviews.author: natalia  besser

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great little sushi set. I can finally get my husband and kids to make me homemade sushi! Saves us money and fun for the family to do together. It's a nice bamboo set and everything needed. Not 5 stars for easy to clean only because no sushi mat is easy to clean but if you put clear wrap down when rolling on any sushi mat it helps stay clean when using . Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Wong

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift
customer_reviews.text: The kit arrived quickly and offers a beautiful presentation. Customer service also sends a phone number for any questions or problems. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: G. L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little set that gets the job done. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little set that gets the job done. The plastic bag that it comes with broke after using it once which was a little disappointing. The rice spreader started to splinter after just one use. The rolling mats work well.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Just dont gift it to a toxic person
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend who then didnt deserve it. Long story short, I broke every piece in half. It wasnt easy, these items are made well and looked beautiful even when destroyed. I highly recommend this product for any beginning sushi maker who is deserving.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Karnes

customer_reviews.title: Great product; even greater results!
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC!! I never knew that I would be able to make my own sushi at home. The mat is essential for a beginner, and this kit is wonderful. The price is right; the product is well made. Delivery was on time and the product arrived intact. I have been making sushi rolls for 2 nights in a row!! LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Just easy to clean 🧼!
customer_reviews.text: I am more satisfied with chopsticks and rice spoons. However, the rolling mat is not very good. It is not soft enough and a bit hard. It is not easy to wrap rice. Actually, I mainly want this. The reason I don’t return is because I think chopsticks and rice scoops can be used. It's worth the price, after all, it's less than $8
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Definitely for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: My first time using a sushi roller and it was surprisingly easy. Tip though, I'd wrap the bamboo in plastic wrap so that you dont get rice in the crevices and let rice cool down before rolling! The nori won't "melt" and you'll be able yo cut it easier. All in all, great product. The chop sticks are a nice bonus as well. C: I would also watch a few videos before rolling to see technique.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and i wanted to learn so i bought this kit. the kit is great but sushi is hard lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: The grand kids and I made our own sushi and had a blast! The price was great and it all worked good. Everyone got to make their favorite combination of fillings. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: rabidreader

customer_reviews.title: Simple, and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Used the mat to roll my first sushi rolls last night, and they came out perfect, even the first one. The rice paddle came in hansy to cool and season my rice. You need extra wide plastic wrap to cover the mat efficiently. But i made due with what i had.
customer_reviews.author: Dave O.

customer_reviews.title: Rice paddle and spreader are ok, bamboo mats not okay.
customer_reviews.text: The rice paddle and spreader are okay but I received the bamboo mats damaged and they are covered in fine splinters so I don't think I should use them
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with this order. Quality was as stated and delivery was less than a week. Everything we needed to go with our bazooka. Love the chopsticks!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for Valentines Day
customer_reviews.text: Works great for making sushi. It had been a few years since I have taking the time to make sushi from scratch so I wasn't very optimistic my first roll would work out but these bamboo sheets worked perfectly and its great they come in packs of two
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Dunning

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your buck!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sushi maker as a gift for my sister for her birthday among other things lol I choose this product because it displayed in a really nice box and for the price...it’s worth far more that the cost! Now l wished l had gotten one for myself ☺️ I would definitely recommend this to anyone who’s a sushi lover ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McCormick

customer_reviews.title: ... never tried making my own sushi before and made perfect rolls on my first attempts with this kit
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried making my own sushi before and made perfect rolls on my first attempts with this kit. It could be because I'm just that awesome, but this kit probably had something to do with my success in transferring my innate greatness into such delectable, homemade sushi rolls. I could go on and on, bloviating about how much I love this kit, but that would take away from valuable sushi-making time.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmm sushi
customer_reviews.text: Love it, been wanting to figure out how to make sushi. Was easy peasy for me and my 7 yr old son to do. And fun
customer_reviews.author: Monique Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16 y/o son who loves sushi. It was easy for him to use and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Trae M

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My husband is a trained chef and he’s been wanting one. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Curtis

customer_reviews.title: The sushi it is great! Sushi is my favorite food
customer_reviews.text: The sushi it is great! Sushi is my favorite food, and I live in a place where there aren’t any good sushi restaurants. I ordered this kit so I could make my own, and it was perfect! I made sushi for the first time and it was so easy! Now I can save so much money because I make my own fresh sushi from home, and I can make my favorite roll combinations.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Lane

product_meta.title: Sushi Making Kit Deluxe with Chopsticks - 100% Bamboo - Includes 2 Rolling Mats, Rice Spreader, Rice Paddle, 5 Pairs Chopsticks
product_meta.description:
BambooWorx SUSHI MAKING KIT Includes 2 Sushi Rolling Mats, Rice Paddle, and a Rice Spreader.





The ultimate sushi making set for all: From the beginner who is just about starting the sushi journey to the world class professional sushi chef creating heavenly masterpieces and not to mention the culinary student. This is an awesome gift idea for all ages. 



Quality: The entire kit is constructed of top quality bamboo material, no splinters, no unraveling of the cotton string stitching, You are guaranteed to get a top quality traditional sushi rolling kit. 

Size: Rolling mats sizes approximately 9.5 X 9.5 inch, Rice paddle and spreader approximately 8 inch. 

Clean: Hand wash with mild soap and warm water, air dry thoroughly or with a soft cloth, do not wash in dishwasher. 

Care: Keep away from high (dry) heat such as sunlight or direct fire, extreme dry temperature may affect appearance of the bamboo grains. 

Maintain: Rub the utensils occasionally with a protective, food-safe oil, such as mineral or cutting board oil, to maintain appearance. 





It all starts with natural bamboo – innovated and designed to perfection so every BambooWorx product is created with you in mind.
feature_bullets: 🍣 ENJOY THE PERFECT AT-HOME SUSHI PARTY: Who doesn’t love sushi? This kit provides everything you need for the complete sushi-making experience. Two full size ROLLING MATS measure 9.5” x 9.5”. The RICE SPOON is used to mix the rice and vinegar. The RICE SPREADER is great for evenly spreading the rice. Whether you’re a beginner, a world class professional sushi chef or a culinary student, this kit has everything you need to make an original snack in just a couple of minutes.

💪 TOP QUALITY IS GUARANTEED: Each item in the Sushi-Making Kit is crafted exceptionally well. It is constructed of top quality bamboo material. You’ll find, with our products there are no splinters and no unraveling of the cotton string stitching. To extend the lifetime of this kit hand wash only, do not expose to high heat and dry each piece thoroughly. Use mineral oil occasionally.

🤷 REALLY EASY TO USE: Do you spend a lot of money in a sushi restaurant? Now you can make your own sushi at home! The Sushi Kit is the easy-to-use and original way to make sushi. First, use the spoon to mix the rice and vinegar. Then use the rice spreader to spread the rice evenly. Roll up the sushi tightly with the specially crafted mats.

🎉 GATHER YOUR FAMILY OR FRIENDS FOR SOME FUN: Hosting a sushi party is a fun, hands-on culinary experience that your guests will never forget! With this kit, rolling sushi is easier than you might think. You can also cook sushi rolls with your children. It’ll teach your kids something new, and develop the fine motor skills of their hands.

🎁 GREAT GIFT IDEA: Here’s is a great chance to present to your friends or loved ones with something special. Our Sushi kit makes a compact, unique and useful gift. Sushi-making is a new experience, one that everyone should try. Present a gift that will always be cherished.
